pages.text: Affects all non-healing spells. Affected spells cooldown increased by 75% and mana cost increased 50%. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_redemption)Path of Redemption$()

pages.mod_text: You and your scepter have become fully devoted to the healing arts; other varieties of magic are lost to it. Available on Redemption if you complete the Bardic Path of Redemption
